metadata.title: CVE-2023-52878 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:can: dev: can_put_echo_skb(): don't crash kernel if can_priv::echo_skb isaccessed out of boundsIf the "struct can_priv::echoo_skb" is accessed out of bounds, thiswould cause a kernel crash. Instead, issue a meaningful warningmessage and return with an error.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
